tips: While intended primarily for browser bookmarks and filepath shortcuts, any Rainmeter Bang (with brackets removed) will work in the [Path] parameter.
If replicating a Rainmeter bang, only one bang is permitted with the start/end brackets omitted. If you need more than 1 Bang for your Path, it is probably unsuited for this environment.
[Launch Cost] may be a non-numeric value and serve no functional purpose.
Local filepaths will always be marked with a shortcut icon.
Big Icon Image assets will treat @Resources\assets\shopitems as its root directory. Store any image assets you would like to use in that folder.
The [Path] parameter follows the same syntax as a Rainmeter bang. The brackets must be omitted.
If the link is found to be a browser path, its favicon will be downloaded and archived to be used as a currency icon. Otherwise, it will be identified as a shortcut.
